There is an overwhelming amount of things to do on the island of Ventotene!
It is a place for relaxing, swimming and just generally chilling out.

value: content=Santa Candida, patron saint of the island of Ventotene, is celebrated on September 20 with a week of events between the sacred and the profane. Events include the traditional shows in the square, games and hot air balloon competitions, where teams are judged on size, shape, decoration and technique of the launch of the balloons, with fireworks and the procession of the Holy Boat of Candida which holds the body that was found on the banks of the Santa Pozzillo.
